metadata.Title: CVE-2023-25434 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: libtiff 4.5.0 is vulnerable to Buffer Overflow via extractContigSamplesBytes() at /libtiff/tools/tiffcrop.c:3215.

notes.Note: sbeattie> vulnerability in the tiffcrop CLI tool ccdm94> the fix for this issue is the same as the one for CVE-2023-0795.

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
